infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: Tracking Authenticates Employees are at Location of Job Site.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Tracking Authenticates Employees are at Location of Job Site.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app uses the camera to authenticate users installation and login, site job work, and upload receipts of job
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app uses the photos to authenticate users installation and login, site job work, and upload receipts of job
infoPlist.NSFaceIDUsageDescription: Face ID Authenticates Employee Installation of App
